ideas.title: Databricks raises $4B at $134B valuation as its AI business heats up
ideas.description: The data intelligence company has just raised more than $4 billion in a Series L funding round at a $134 billion valuation â€” up 34% from the $100 billion valuation that it achieved just three months ago.
hooks: AI's Billion-Dollar Rocket: Databricks' Insane Growth Story
How One Company Is Rewriting Tech Valuation Rules
Silicon Valley's Latest Unicorn: The $134B AI Disruptor

tips: Use cinematic B-roll of tech headquarters and data centers
Include dynamic financial graphics showing valuation trajectory
Incorporate expert interview clips for documentary authenticity

visualDirection.description: High-contrast blue and silver color palette, sleek motion graphics illustrating financial growth, modern sans-serif typography with technical overlay animations, dynamic camera movements suggesting momentum and innovation, blend of archival footage and contemporary tech visualizations

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic financial growth visualization
Context: Databricks' market position and AI strategy
Deep Dive: Funding round implications for tech ecosystem
Expert Analysis: What $134B valuation really means
Future Projection: AI investment landscape transformation

ideas.title: Adobe Firefly now supports prompt-based video editing, adds more third-party models
ideas.description: Adobe is updating its AI video-generation app, Firefly, with a new video editor that supports precise prompt-based edits, as well as adding new third-party models for image and video generation, including Black Forest Labs' FLUX.2 and Topaz Astra.
hooks: AI Video Editing: Adobe Firefly's Game-Changing Update
Prompt Magic: Inside Adobe's Latest Firefly Revolution
Future of Video Editing Just Dropped ðŸ”¥

tips: Enable live chat interaction during stream for real-time audience engagement
Prepare pre-screened Q&A questions to maintain flow
Use YouTube Premieres to build anticipation before live event

visualDirection.description: High-energy motion graphics with dynamic split-screen transitions, electric blue and neon accent color palette, futuristic sans-serif typography, floating holographic UI elements showcasing Firefly interface, rapid-cut B-roll demonstrating video editing capabilities

exampleOutline: Section 1: High-Energy Intro & Live Stream Setup
Section 2: Adobe Firefly's Current Landscape & Context
Section 3: Deep Dive into Prompt-Based Video Editing

ideas.title: Zoom says it aced AIâ€™s hardest exam. Critics say it copied off its neighbors.

hooks: AI Cheating Scandal: Zoom's Shocking Test Score Exposed
